sile.script: SILE.require(CASILE.include) SILE.documentState.documentClass.writeToc = function () end SILE.registerCommand("meta:surum", function () SILE.typesetter:typeset(versioninfo) end) CASILE.metadata = require("readmeta").load(metadatafile) SILE.registerCommand("output-right-running-head", function () end)
